item.title: Wicked Domestic Box Office Soars Past A Spielberg Classic On All-Time Universal Chart
item.description: As Wicked's theatrical run comes to a close, the movie has flown into Universal's top highest-grossing movies and overtook a beloved sci-fi classic.

item.title: Nosferatu Gains Awards Season Steam With New Nominations After Being Shut Out Of The Golden Globes
item.description: After being completely shut out at the Golden Globes, Robert Eggers' Nosferatu remake gains steam once more with a slew of major nominations.

item.title: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood And Honey 3: Confirmation & Everything We Know
item.description: The outrageous mascot horror series rolls on after a successful first sequel, and here's everything to know about Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey 3.
